column2: Reynolds is battling a pectoral injury and is on the injured reserve list. It is uncertain if he will come off of the IR during Week 9 against the Panthers.
Upshaw has been held out of the previous three games with ankle and knee injuries. It is uncertain if he will return against the Patriots during Week 7.
Grace missed the last game due to a hamstring injury and it is unclear if he will play Week 7 against the Patriots.
Sanu has been sidelined with an injured hamstring and it is unknown if he will return to the lineup against the Patriots in Week 7.
Mauger has been placed on the injured reserve list with a knee injury and it is unclear if he will return November 5 against the Panthers.
Crawford tore his biceps and is on the injured reserve list.
Collins has been issued a 10-game suspension for violating the NFL's Performance Enhancing Drugs policy but is expected to be available against the Buccaneers on November 26.
